definition: God's plans supersede our own/Man proposes but God disposes
pinyin: ren2 suan4 bu4 ru2 tian1 suan4

definition: man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
(negative prefix)/not/no
as/as if/such as
day/sky/heaven
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
lit. Cheng Yaojin ambushes the enemy (saying)/fig. sb shows up unexpectedly and disrupts the plan/sb whose presence is regarded as irksome
pinyin: ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 ge4 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1

definition: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
pinyin: tang2 lang2 bu3 chan2 , huang2 que4 zai4 hou4

definition: to miscalculate/miscalculation
things turn out contrary to the way one wishes (idiom)
curious coincidence
to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
fortune as unpredictable as the weather, every day may bring fortune or calamity (idiom); sth unexpected may happen at any moment
pinyin: tian1 you3 bu4 ce4 feng1 yun2 , ren2 you3 dan4 xi1 huo4 fu2
related.word: 天有不測風雲，人有旦夕禍福

definition: (idiom) to have one's words turn out to be (tragically) prophetic
the old man lost his mare, but it all turned out for the best (idiom); fig. a blessing in disguise/it's an ill wind that blows nobody any good
pinyin: sai4 weng1 shi1 ma3 yan1 zhi1 fei1 fu2

definition: appropriate retribution (idiom)
who would have thought that/who would have expected that
providence/the Will of Heaven
lit. a wise person reflecting a thousand times can still make a mistake (idiom); fig. nobody is infallible
pinyin: zhi4 zhe3 qian1 lu:4 , bi4 you3 yi1 shi1

definition: to succeed by a lucky stroke
misfortune does not come singly (idiom)/it never rains but it pours
